name: BloodSouls
description:
Bloodsouls (not the final name) is an (obviously) Bloodborne and Dark Souls inspired game. 

You will explore a post-apocalyptic city of London fighting monsters and trying to remember what made you end up in this situation by occasionally stumbling upon places that trigger your memories. 

The game is in its earliest stage, but it took me over a year to make. I can't keep it locked for so long so launch it in this condition. I want to see if there's any potential by receiving feedback from you. The more feedback = the faster the development. 

-------------------------------------------------

Before you play: 
-Pressing Shift to run or M to jump back wastes your stamina (invisible yet). So don't press it all the time and just wait a bit.
-Saves don't work for now. They only save your location. (still figuring out how to add saves. So let it be "rougelike" for now)

-------------------------------------------------

If you have any suggestions leave them here - I'll be happy to read them and add to the game if possible.

If you're a fellow dev that wants to help - reach out to me directly. Cuz not gonna lie I need some help with this mess.
